name: Just Another Space Game (FinTheFinn)
description:
This game is a school project where i was supposed to make a game like Invaders, so the space ship was only supposed to be at the left or bottom side shooting at enemies, but i thought that was boring so i made it so you can go anywhere while enemy ships appear around you!

you move by pressing A & D to rotate and W to move forward and you shoot with 'Space' but you have to turn around to face the enemy in order to shoot witch makes it harder! also the enemy can shoot each other... and i'm too lazy to do anything about it

also the more kills you get (or the enemy) the higher your score gets
